TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE the applicant was dismissed from work . Subsequently , and before DATE , he filed an action with ORG to have the dismissal decision annulled .
On DATE ORG rejected his action . On DATE ORG dismissed his appeal .

In the course of subsequent review proceedings , ORG quashed ORG decision on DATE and remitted the case to the latter court . ORG held in its ruling that the taking of evidence in the case had been insufficient .
In the resumed proceedings , ORG , on DATE , gave an interim judgment . It amended ORG judgment and held that the applicant 's dismissal had been unlawful .

The proceedings concerning the applicant 's pecuniary claims were resumed before ORG . On DATE ORG awarded the applicant MONEY ( ORG ) plus accrued interest by way of severance pay and ORG CARDINAL accrued interest for outstanding wages . The judgment was served on the applicant on DATE . In the absence of any appeal , the judgment became final on DATE .
The Government have submitted the avis de réception attached to the letter containing the decision . They maintain that the handwritten date of service on the avis de réception is DATE .
